price: ¿Qué les impide prosternarse cuando se les recita el Corán?
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
